engChrName: The second race was between Graham and Jack.
engSearchText: The second race was between Graham and Jack.
jpnChrName: 第二戦はグレアムＶＳジャック。
jpnSearchText: <C1>第二戦はグレアムＶＳジャック。

engChrName: Graham decided to trade cars with Junifer for the race.
engSearchText:
Graham decided to trade cars with Junifer for
the race.
jpnChrName: グレアムはユニファと車を入れ替えて レノのセダンで勝負に臨み──
jpnSearchText:
グレアムはユニファと車を入れ替えて
レノのセダンで勝負に臨み──

engChrName: As such, it was a battle between sedans from Red Star and Leno.
engSearchText:
As such, it was a battle between sedans from Red Star
and Leno.
jpnChrName: レッドスターとレノのセダン対決となる。
jpnSearchText: <C1>レッドスターとレノのセダン対決となる。

engChrName: The specs between the two vehicles were nearly the same, and both drivers were at similar skill levels.
engSearchText:
The specs between the two vehicles were nearly the
same, and both drivers were at similar skill levels.
jpnChrName: マシンスペックもテクニックもほぼ互角── 勝負は最後までもつれるかと思われたが……
jpnSearchText:
マシンスペックもテクニックもほぼ互角──
勝負は最後までもつれるかと思われたが……

engChrName: At first, they were neck and neck, but Jack gradually widened the gap between them—driving almost as if he could predict the future.
engSearchText:
At first, they were neck and neck, but Jack gradually
widened the gap between them—driving almost as if
he could predict the future.
jpnChrName: まるで未来を読むかのようなジャックの コース選択が少しずつ差を広げ──
jpnSearchText:
まるで未来を読むかのようなジャックの
コース選択が少しずつ差を広げ──

engChrName: By the time Jack crossed the finish line, he was significantly in the lead.
engSearchText:
By the time Jack crossed the finish line, he was
significantly in the lead.
jpnChrName: 終わってみればジャックの圧勝で決着。
jpnSearchText: <C1>終わってみればジャックの圧勝で決着。

engChrName: After that, it was time for the third race to begin.
engSearchText: After that, it was time for the third race to begin.
jpnChrName: そして勝負は第三戦へと突入した──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして勝負は第三戦へと突入した──

engChrName: Hell yeah. Now it's my time to shine! You better not make this too easy for me, woman!
engSearchText:
Hell yeah. Now it's my time to shine! You better not
make this too easy for me, woman!
jpnChrName: クク、ようやく俺の番が来たか。 楽しませてくれよ、女ライダー。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ようやく俺の番が来たか。
楽しませてくれよ、女ライダー。

engChrName: Wouldn't dream of it.
engSearchText: Wouldn't dream of it.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それは私のセリフね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、それは私のセリフね。

engChrName: I can tell you're no ordinary racer, so I trust that you know how to put a bike through its paces.
engSearchText:
I can tell you're no ordinary racer, so I trust that you
know how to put a bike through its paces.
jpnChrName: ただならない雰囲気があると思っていたけど…… バイクの方も相当できるんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ただならない雰囲気があると思っていたけど……
バイクの方も相当できるんでしょう？

engChrName: Hah! You got that right!
engSearchText: Hah! You got that right!
jpnChrName: ハッ、それはその目で確かめるんだな！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、それはその目で確かめるんだな！

engChrName: Outta the way!
engSearchText: Outta the way!
jpnChrName: オラオラ、邪魔だァ！
jpnSearchText: オラオラ、邪魔だァ！

engChrName: Sorry! Coming through!
engSearchText: Sorry! Coming through!
jpnChrName: ごめん、通るわよ──！
jpnSearchText: ごめん、通るわよ──！

engChrName: I'm gettin' a headache just looking at that guy.
engSearchText: I'm gettin' a headache just looking at that guy.
jpnChrName: ヴァルターの奴め…… 見ていて胃が痛いぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァルターの奴め……
見ていて胃が痛いぜ……

engChrName: Can't relate. I'm keeping my eyes peeled in case he gets sick of the traffic and starts smashing cars.
engSearchText:
Can't relate. I'm keeping my eyes peeled in case he
gets sick of the traffic and starts smashing cars.
jpnChrName: そのうち面倒になって邪魔な車を 潰していっちまうんじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
そのうち面倒になって邪魔な車を
潰していっちまうんじゃねーか？

engChrName: Oh, please. There's no way he's strong enough to do that...right?
engSearchText:
Oh, please. There's no way he's strong enough to do
that...right?
jpnChrName: いやいや、人間にそんなこと できる訳ないじゃん～……ないよね？
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、人間にそんなこと
できる訳ないじゃん～……ないよね？

engChrName: That was a kickass race.
engSearchText: That was a kickass race.
jpnChrName: ……決着がついたか。 とんでもねえレースだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……決着がついたか。
とんでもねえレースだったな。

engChrName: No kidding. Watching that makes me wanna get behind the wheel and go riding again.
engSearchText:
No kidding. Watching that makes me wanna get
behind the wheel and go riding again.
jpnChrName: ああいう乗り方もあるんだな。 クク、俺もまた乗りたくなってきたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああいう乗り方もあるんだな。
クク、俺もまた乗りたくなってきたぜ。

engChrName: You're up, Junifer. Get on out there and show 'em who's boss.
engSearchText:
You're up, Junifer. Get on out there and show 'em
who's boss.
jpnChrName: 次はユニファだったな。 頑張って来いよ。
jpnSearchText:
次はユニファだったな。
頑張って来いよ。

engChrName: Will do!
engSearchText: Will do!
jpnChrName: うんっ、必ず勝ってきちゃうから！
jpnSearchText: うんっ、必ず勝ってきちゃうから！

engChrName: Next up was a fateful confrontation between Junifer and Lucio.
engSearchText:
Next up was a fateful confrontation between Junifer
and Lucio.
jpnChrName: 第四戦はユニファＶＳルシオの因縁の対決。
jpnSearchText: <C1>第四戦はユニファＶＳルシオの因縁の対決。

engChrName: Junifer borrowed Graham's Ingert sports car for the race.
engSearchText:
Junifer borrowed Graham's Ingert sports car for
the race.
jpnChrName: ユニファはグレアムに借り受けた インゲルトのスポーツカーを駆り──
jpnSearchText:
ユニファはグレアムに借り受けた
インゲルトのスポーツカーを駆り──

engChrName: Meanwhile, Lucio drove a top-of-the-line ETWS sports car.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, Lucio drove a top-of-the-line ETWS
sports car.
jpnChrName: ルシオの最高級スポーツカーに挑む。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ルシオの最高級スポーツカーに挑む。

engChrName: Its higher top speed gave Lucio the advantage.
engSearchText: Its higher top speed gave Lucio the advantage.
jpnChrName: 最先端のエトワス製エンジンが生み出す最高速は このコース（アウトバーン）において有利に働いたが……
jpnSearchText:
最先端のエトワス製エンジンが生み出す最高速は
このコース（アウトバーン）において有利に働いたが……

engChrName: However, Junifer, who knew her vehicle's quirks like the back of her hand, was hot on his tail the whole way through.
engSearchText:
However, Junifer, who knew her vehicle's quirks like
the back of her hand, was hot on his tail the whole
way through.
jpnChrName: ユニファは、車体特性を知り尽くした 見事なハンドリングで、その差を開かせない。
jpnSearchText:
ユニファは、車体特性を知り尽くした
見事なハンドリングで、その差を開かせない。

engChrName: In the end, Lucio's nerves got the better of him, and he fumbled a corner at the last stretch of the race— giving Junifer a well-deserved victory.
engSearchText:
In the end, Lucio's nerves got the better of him, and
he fumbled a corner at the last stretch of the race—
giving Junifer a well-deserved victory.
jpnChrName: 最後は焦ったルシオがコーナリングでミスを犯し、 ユニファに勝利が転がり込むのだった。
jpnSearchText:
最後は焦ったルシオがコーナリングでミスを犯し、
ユニファに勝利が転がり込むのだった。

engChrName: Thus, it was time for the fifth and final race to begin...
engSearchText:
Thus, it was time for the fifth and final race
to begin...
jpnChrName: そして勝負は第五戦に移る──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして勝負は第五戦に移る──

engChrName: If you think I'm gonna go easy on you just because I owe you one, think again! Now's my chance to give you a taste of my revenge!
engSearchText:
If you think I'm gonna go easy on you just because I
owe you one, think again! Now's my chance to give
you a taste of my revenge!
jpnChrName: フフ、君には随分世話になっているが…… せっかくの機会、手加減はしないよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、君には随分世話になっているが……
せっかくの機会、手加減はしないよ。

engChrName: Maxim may be a complete buffoon, but he's still a racing champion.
engSearchText:
Maxim may be a complete buffoon, but he's still a
racing champion.
jpnChrName: 最近忘れがちになるが 相手はトップレベルの天才レーサーだ。
jpnSearchText:
最近忘れがちになるが
相手はトップレベルの天才レーサーだ。

engChrName: If I don't pull out all the stops, I'm gonna lose.
engSearchText: If I don't pull out all the stops, I'm gonna lose.
jpnChrName: 正面から挑んだら負ける……どう戦うか。
jpnSearchText: 正面から挑んだら負ける……どう戦うか。

engChrName: Now, then. Let the rematch of the century...begin!
engSearchText: Now, then. Let the rematch of the century...begin!
jpnChrName: さぁ、リベンジマッチ開始だ──！
jpnSearchText: さぁ、リベンジマッチ開始だ──！

engChrName: Why's he lettin' me get ahead? Does he want to see what my girl can do?
engSearchText:
Why's he lettin' me get ahead? Does he want to see
what my girl can do?
jpnChrName: 先行させてもらってるようだが……様子見か？
jpnSearchText: 先行させてもらってるようだが……様子見か？

engChrName: Well, I'll gladly show him! Time to bust out my secret weapon!
engSearchText:
Well, I'll gladly show him! Time to bust out my
secret weapon!
jpnChrName: それなら、今のうちに仕掛けさせてもらう！
jpnSearchText: それなら、今のうちに仕掛けさせてもらう！

engChrName: Gotta admit. The way he handles that pickup truck is impressive.
engSearchText:
Gotta admit. The way he handles that pickup truck
is impressive.
jpnChrName: 相変わらず、その車体（ピックアップトラック）を うまくコントロールしているようだ！
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず、その車体（ピックアップトラック）を
うまくコントロールしているようだ！

engChrName: I'll bet five thousand mira he'll use that turbocharger next.
engSearchText:
I'll bet five thousand mira he'll use that
turbocharger next.
jpnChrName: 君にターボチャージャーがあるのは知ってる──
jpnSearchText: 君にターボチャージャーがあるのは知ってる──

engChrName: But I'm going to stop that plan in its tracks!
engSearchText: But I'm going to stop that plan in its tracks!
jpnChrName: 悪いが、それは封じさせてもらう！
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、それは封じさせてもらう！

engChrName: Damn it!
engSearchText: Damn it!
jpnChrName: くっ……前に出られただと！？
jpnSearchText: くっ……前に出られただと！？

engChrName: I know what your car's capable of now. The element of surprise isn't on your side anymore!
engSearchText:
I know what your car's capable of now. The element
of surprise isn't on your side anymore!
jpnChrName: 君の車の特性はもう分かってるのさ！
jpnSearchText: 君の車の特性はもう分かってるのさ！

engChrName: Guess I'll just have to make a risky play!
engSearchText: Guess I'll just have to make a risky play!
jpnChrName: それなら一か八か、やるしかねえな……！
jpnSearchText: それなら一か八か、やるしかねえな……！

engChrName: Haaaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaaah!
jpnChrName: うおおおおおっ！！
jpnSearchText: うおおおおおっ！！

engChrName: Grr...! Don't think you've won!
engSearchText: Grr...! Don't think you've won!
jpnChrName: くそっ、まだだ……！
jpnSearchText: くそっ、まだだ……！

engChrName: Don't underestimate me, champ!
engSearchText: Don't underestimate me, champ!
jpnChrName: なめんなよ、レーサー！
jpnSearchText: なめんなよ、レーサー！

engChrName: Haha. I'm impressed you managed to shake me off. However, it won't be enough to beat me!
engSearchText:
Haha. I'm impressed you managed to shake me off.
However, it won't be enough to beat me!
jpnChrName: ハハ、僕を振り切るとは流石だ……！ だが──！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、僕を振り切るとは流石だ……！
だが──！

engChrName: He did it! Van won!
engSearchText: He did it! Van won!
jpnChrName: や、やったぁ～！　ヴァンが勝ったよ～！
jpnSearchText: や、やったぁ～！　ヴァンが勝ったよ～！

engChrName: Haha. He might be on the other team, but even I feel like standin' up and clappin' for him.
engSearchText:
Haha. He might be on the other team, but even I feel
like standin' up and clappin' for him.
jpnChrName: はは、敵ながら天晴な走りっぷりだぜ。
jpnSearchText: はは、敵ながら天晴な走りっぷりだぜ。

engChrName: Van's insane! Who knew he was such a skilled driver?!
engSearchText: Van's insane! Who knew he was such a skilled driver?!
jpnChrName: 流石ヴァンさん、 あんな走りは普通できないぜ！
jpnSearchText:
流石ヴァンさん、
あんな走りは普通できないぜ！

engChrName: Looks like Max clinched it.
engSearchText: Looks like Max clinched it.
jpnChrName: あれは── “マックス”さんの勝ちだね～……！
jpnSearchText:
あれは──
“マックス”さんの勝ちだね～……！

engChrName: Van did his best, but beating a Z1 champion was a tall order.
engSearchText:
Van did his best, but beating a Z1 champion was a
tall order.
jpnChrName: ヴァンの野郎も善戦はしたが…… 流石に天才レーサーには敵わなかったか。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンの野郎も善戦はしたが……
流石に天才レーサーには敵わなかったか。

engChrName: I'll give him an A+ for effort, though!
engSearchText: I'll give him an A+ for effort, though!
jpnChrName: だけど、めちゃくちゃ カッコ良かったぜ、ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText:
だけど、めちゃくちゃ
カッコ良かったぜ、ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: I-Is he insane?!
engSearchText: I-Is he insane?!
jpnChrName: しょ、正気かね！？
jpnSearchText: しょ、<w1000>正気かね！？

engChrName: Off-roading's pretty damn fun. You should give it a try!
engSearchText:
Off-roading's pretty damn fun. You should give it
a try!
jpnChrName: 丁度この場所のオフロードは 案外走り心地がいいんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
丁度この場所のオフロードは
案外走り心地がいいんだぜ？

engChrName: Oh, but I guess your fancy sports car ain't gonna be able to handle it. Too bad!
engSearchText:
Oh, but I guess your fancy sports car ain't gonna be
able to handle it. Too bad!
jpnChrName: お行儀がいいスポーツカーじゃ ここまで来れねえだろうがな！
jpnSearchText:
お行儀がいいスポーツカーじゃ
ここまで来れねえだろうがな！

engChrName: Time to blast to the finish line!
engSearchText: Time to blast to the finish line!
jpnChrName: こっからぶち抜かせてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText: こっからぶち抜かせてもらうぜ！
